name: MinValPro
description:
A game of tag! Huzzah what a fun game this was, when i was little we did not even have power-ups. This is a clear advantage of MinValPro!!!

Grandpa, what does MinValPro even mean.

Well, son or daughter.. it means minimum valueable product but this is far more than valueable.. It´s precious :O So you can´t play with me.

But grandpa, its two-player only

Ok, but only for this time... and I will kick your behind or ass
